title: Publish a photo post to an owned account

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by TikTok creators. To obtain an access token, use /tt_user/oauth2/token/ .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Request message type. Allowed format: application/json .

parameters.name: business_id
parameters.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok account. Pass the value of the open_id field returned in the response of /tt_user/oauth2/token/ to this field.

parameters.name: photo_images
parameters.description: A list of up to 35 publicly accessible HTTP(s) URLs for the photo content to be published. Photo constraints : The maximum resolution of the image is 1080 x 1920 pixels or 1920 x 1080 pixels. File size: within 20 MB for each image. File type: JPG, JPEG, or WebP. Example : https://tiktok.com/tiktok-images/image.jpg Important : You cannot publish photo posts using unverified photo URLs. To ensure a smooth API integration, we recommend you verify ownership of URL properties as soon as possible, and specify a URL that has been verified for ownership, either manually or automatically. To manually verify ownership of a URL property, follow the steps outlined in Manage URL properties . Note that if you are a developer or an advertiser who used the /business/video/publish/ endpoint to publish videos prior to April 7th, 2023, we have automatically set the corresponding domains of video URLs specified through the video_url parameter to the "verified" status. Therefore, we recommend that you use the /business/property/list/ endpoint to confirm whether the domains you utilize for hosting images have been automatically verified.

parameters.name: photo_cover_index
parameters.description: The index of the photo to be used as the cover for the post. Default value: 0 (the first photo). For example, if you want to use the second photo as the post cover, set this field to 1 .

parameters.name: privacy_level
parameters.description: The privacy level of the photo post. Enum values: PUBLIC_TO_EVERYONE : Everyone (people on or off TikTok). MUTUAL_FOLLOW_FRIENDS : Friends (followers you follow back). FOLLOWER_OF_CREATOR : Followers (Visible only to followers on your private account). SELF_ONLY : Only you. To determine the allowed values for your TikTok account's posts, use /business/video/settings/ and obtain privacy_level_options from the response.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the post. Length limit: 90 runes (UTF-16 code units).

parameters.name: caption
parameters.description:
Post caption/description - which can contain #hashtags and @mentions of friends (mutual followers) of the owned TikTok Account. Length limit: 4,000 runes (UTF-16 code units), including a maximum of 30 mentions. You can use "
" as line break to display the post caption in multiple lines within the mobile TikTok App. However, for the line break to work effectively, the caption must contain enough characters to trigger truncation based on the current mobile phone's display settings and operating system. This truncation is characterized by an ellipsis mark (...) and the word "more", which users can click to expand and view the full caption. If the caption is too short and does not trigger truncation, the "
" character will be ignored, and the caption will be displayed on a single line without any line breaks. Note that in the TikTok Web App "
" will always be ignored. Example: Me and me casa üè† #cat #kitten #britishshorthair Note : Any hashtags and mentions included in the post caption will render as plain text on the TikTok application.

parameters.name: auto_add_music
parameters.description: Whether to automatically add recommended music to the post. Enum values: true , false . Default value: false . If you set this field to true , you can change the music later in the TikTok app.

parameters.name: is_brand_organic
parameters.description: Whether to enable the Brand Organic Content toggle for the video. If this field is set to true , the video will be labeled as Brand Organic Content, indicating you are promoting yourself or your own business. A "Promotional content" label will be attached to the video. Note : If you set both is_brand_organic and is_branded_content to true , is_brand_organic will be ignored and the video will be labeled as Branded Content.

parameters.name: is_branded_content
parameters.description: Whether to enable the Branded Content toggle for the video. If this field is set to true , the video will be labeled as Branded Content, indicating you are in a paid partnership with a brand. A "Paid partnership" label will be attached to the video. Note : If you set both is_brand_organic and is_branded_content to true , is_brand_organic will be ignored and the video will be labeled as Branded Content.

parameters.name: is_draft
parameters.description: Whether to upload the post as a draft. Supported values: true , false . Default value: false . If you set this field to true , all the other fields within post_info , except for title and caption , will be ignored. Note : If you want to use this parameter to upload the post as a draft, obtain a TikTok account access token with video.upload permission and the application-specific unique ID for the TikTok account by following the steps in Authorization and Authentication . To confirm whether a TikTok account access token has video.upload permission, use /tt_user/token_info/get/ and check the returned scope. If the access token doesn't have the video.upload permission, request the TikTok account owner to approve draft uploading permission through the Authorization workflow.

parameters.name: disable_comment
parameters.description: Whether to disable the "Allow comments" setting for the published photo post. Supported values: false : To enable the setting. true : To disable the setting. To determine the allowed values for your TikTok account's posts, use /business/video/settings/ and obtain comment_disabled from the response. If comment_disabled is true , you can only set this field to true . If comment_disabled is false , you can set this field to true or false . Default value : false Example : false
